xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/568946-Avalon: Live in Concert - Testify to Love 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/32D0AgpaqrD7B2RQNPQxb1FZYg2.jpg Over the past seven years, Avalon has delighted Christian music listeners with their inspiring anthems and stirring vocals. With 18 #1 hits, the songs of Avalon have become staples at Christian radio. Now, for the first time in their career, Avalon releases a live performance DVD of some of their biggest hits. Testify To Love: Live In Concert offers the perfect reflection on Avalon's heralded past and delivers an exciting sneak preview of the future. Avalon: Live in Concert - Testify to Love
